text: @FredTJoseph @gofundme I’m trying so hard to not lose hope @FredTJoseph but I’ve been posting asking for help for 10 days straight. I’m a single mom, I lost my daughters father to suicide & lost my job to covid19, needless to say the last few months have been a struggle. PLEASE SEE ME 😭🙏🏻  $EmmaCrafts
